ygData.subject: Question about the Vampiric Embrace Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, I am a proud level 10 Gnome Necro in Freeport and I have a question about one spell. Does anyone know how to correctly use the Vampiric Embrace
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all,

I am a proud level 10 Gnome Necro in Freeport and I have a question about
one spell. Does anyone know how to correctly use the Vampiric Embrace spell?
I mean I thought it was like lifetap or lifespike (where you target your
opponent and you steal his HP) but with this spell when I target a monster,
I see I hand icon appear on my display and nothing else happens. Now I have
tried to attack a creature and sometimes when the thing dies I get some HP's
back but not all the time....

Do I have to be bare handed for it to work or is there something I am doing
wrong?

Any help with this spell would be appreciated.


thanks in advance.


Cilten
Level 10 Gnome Necromancer
Cazic-Thule Server
